A young man is accused of raping a young woman.

After marriage, a woman struggles to be the submissive wife that her husband and his family expect her to be. The story follows her journey, as she changes herself and, even more so, changes the household.

Eflatun, a blind woman since childhood, has been able to get a hold of her life with the help of her father's various shadow and sound plays. Eflatun inherits her father's profession of clock repair. She waits for a man with who she had fallen in love with his voice. One day a man whose voice is identical to the man she's searching for comes into the shop.

On the run and desperately seeking refuge from the law, the outlaws hit the road with Samantha as their hostage, but none of them expected what fate would choose for them, Join Samantha on her death defying journey in Caged And Wild.
When Angie is found brutally murdered in the woods of her village, it's her father's job, Niko, to claim justice. This starts a circle of vengeance that won't be interrupted easily.

When a drug deal goes wrong, it catches the attention of both the law and the criminal world. What follows is utter mayhem that will link the fate of three gangs, an unscrupulous cop, a greedy mobster and a street-smart stringer.
Drawn from Homer's Iliad, Thersites, a soldier from the Trojan war, travels a haunted ancient world to learn the power of remembered history.

With a broken-heart, Jesse Collins uses her quick wit as a shield. Through a poetry program, Jesse meets Hannah, a housewife. The two find more than they expected, but could she possibly be the one to inspire Jesse to move on?

A widowed mother, tries desperately to get an entry into the ruthless world of professional football for her 12-yer-old son.
Sebastian travels by road from Oklahoma to Mexico to find his long-gone brother, Nico, determined to unveil the buried secrets that destroyed their family.
Jordi travels to La Palma to fulfill a promise, there he will meet Linda - They will never leave the island.

Clara and Diego, under the guidance of the psychiatrist of a day rehabilitation center for disturbed people who attend, decide to transform the treatment center into a restaurant, involving all their other companions.

Surprised but charmed by this man who seems to know her very well, Stella decides to let him in. But when Sandro, the man who broke Stella's heart, joins them at home, this odd situation turns immediately into chaos.

A sequel to very successful comedy Bulbule; which had released in 2013. This time featuring 12 brainy people fighting over how to fix a basic flaw in the Indian education system.

The film opens on three estranged high school friends-Cameron Poole, Jackson Schiff, and Emma Porter-who reunite at a concert in their 20s and are suddenly confronted with the dreams that life had forced them to abandon; as they struggle to heal their relationship, their futures, and themselves.

Two women on the verge of a breakup, in a hospital, are further stressed on the night of a big demonstration by the overwhelmed staff and by angry, injured protestors who land up besieging the building.
The tranquil lives of a family isolated from the rest of society are disturbed by a terrifying creature, testing the ties that bind them together.
American gangster Erik Vasquez is scheming to become the top dog in the Mexican underworld, only to find himself making enemies out of both the powerful cartels and his own allies.
Fast-paced story of pre-death repentance marathon for the captain of the National Security Service (NKVD) Fyodor Volkonogov set against the backdrop of 1938 political persecutions in the USSR.
A motorcycle drifter saves a beautiful girl from a gang of psychos and thieves. The outcome for these outlaws will be massacre of deaths.
An American master of Japanese swordsmanship and his apprentice defend their students from a cabal of neo- fascists.

Based on the award winning play. Inspired by the 1939 Harlem Rens basketball team. A story of eight men who overcame adversity to win more than 2,000 games while barnstorming throughout segregated parts of the country in the 1930s.
The world's water shortage crisis.

Argumento: Jaakko and Sirpa have never met face to face but they talk on the phone every day. When he hears about her declining health, he decides to go meet her in another city; a challenge if you can't see and are paralyzed from the chest down.
Nombre de la película: The Blind Man Who Did Not Want to See Titanic

Argumento: Paris, summer 1942. Irene is Jewish and French. She is 19 and living a life of passions - Her friendships, her new love, her desire to be an actress - Nothing suggests that Irene's time is running out.
Shark Records has two new artist - Lucky and Poutine. Both artists have polar opposite experiences on their journey to fame.

A socially isolated man takes interest in driving people around among the suburbs of Stockholm, where his cynical thoughts gets fueled by the perceived pretentiousness and blindness of people that only see him for what he is, a driver.

It's summer break, Emma and her father are rehashing a painful previous year but it's time to move on, Tom's return to the small town won't help make matters easier. Emma is only sixteen and has her whole life ahead of her.
In the year 2121 A prisoner, formerly an Astronaut/Pilot with California Science Division is released to question former members of his team.

Isaiah, a young Mexican-American LA native who's dream is to become a film writer and director, struggles with drug addiction, traumas, faith, inner demons and falling in love.

Argumento: When a woman finally becomes pregnant but is diagnosed with a deadly condition, she must lean on her family to save her unborn child.
As three young men recount their lives going about Los Angeles, they encounter a young aspiring journalist who puts aside political bias to get their take on the current state of culture.

Shirley and Roy in the middle of an impending Covid lock-down and a personal financial crisis, leave their Mumbai home for Shirley's home in Pala where her father Ittyavira stays. Roy soon finds that her home is not what he thought it is.
A beautifully woven anthology shows us the emotions, lifestyles, relations during the times of lesser techno invasion, and more humane touch in the banks of Godavari.

When a divorced nurse's son ends up in a hospital which is hit by a cyber attack, she has to determine which patients need medical attention the most and making life-determining decisions in the process.
Meirose strives to create heaven in her family, with her husband and their two children. One day, Ray, a man from her past, returns and wants to build his lost paradise with Meirose and Akbar.
Centers in the theme of reincarnation, unfolding in Kolkata and Hyderabad.
Eeswaran tells the story of Periyasamy whose simple and joyous life turns into a nightmare with internal familial disputes.

When an ambiguously Intentioned masked man kidnaps a drug addicted punk singer, it triggers a police investigation as well as a media circus.
A true account of how God forever changed the life of a police officer who was battling alcoholism, depression, and devastating loss.
TETHERED is a sci-fi mystery set in the present day. Detective Sam Morris starts on a missing-persons case that puts her own personal world into upheaval.

Shadi is a little girl that her parents have been accused of murdering a girl in the village, and villagers killed her parents to seek revenge. Her uncle adops her and now Shadi must face the problems that people of the village caused them.
Young, beautiful and against abortion, she will be the hand of god and commit a life changing act.
The Radcliffes, a wealthy, old money family do just about whatever they want in their cheerful home town of Friendly
In an epic adventure where knives will be thrown into shoulders after which one stumbles onto a wire connected to a trap covered by leaves and people will be hacked to gore, a princess must win.

A struggling writer is strapped by a Stay-In-Place order. So, he collaborates with his teen daughter who is poised to attend Yale Law School, and writes about the Pandemic. The manuscript went dark against a brick wall of publishers. Meanwhile, his wife, an ER Nurse, returns to work and contracts COVID-19.
Out of options and out of cash, two best friends - a jaded wannabe filmmaker and an idealistic PhD candidate - contemplate robbing their drug dealer.
A woman travels back in time to befriend her own mother in an attempt to make her life better.
A teenage girl with self-esteem issues finds confidence by spending her summer battling vampires.
October 1992. A group of law students head to a remote home upstate where a girl disappeared two years earlier.
High Stakes revolves around a group of people who have received a mysterious invitation to a private party, hoping to cash in a $100,000 chip.

Based on a real-life incident, Sridevi Soda Center portrays a beautiful, emotional love story amidst the much prevalent caste system and politics in the rural areas.
